name: Forced Kratos Reaction
flavorProject: If the antikratos equations are subduing the Titans, maybe we can find a way to reverse the process and stimulate a kratos reaction
flavorTech: Is it pain or elation?

name: Teleresuscitation
flavorProject: The philosophers of the Last Academy are sure they found a way to stimulate an almost preternatural survival instinct
flavorTech: A Titan springs back to their feet as if Hades himself compelled them

name: Fate Sink
flavorProject: By exerting force on the Triskelion Junction, we are able to ever so slightly alter the course of Fate itself
flavorTech: Whose life have we inrrevocably changed?

name: Arrow Barrage
flavorProject: Reinforced spear and arrow tips, as well as synchronocity training, allows ship-stationed warriors to slightly weaken the AT field of a Primordial
flavorTech: Ready volley!

abilityText.value: Place 1 Break token or 2 Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool

name: Crisis Protocol
flavorProject: The fallen priests have uncovered a surprising Gaia connection. Through the Triskelion Junction, we may be able to stimulate some form of spontaneous healing
flavorTech: A new philsophical protocol allows us to tap into the lingering lifeforce of Gaia and re-direct it to or from a Titan

abilityText.value: That Titan may gain or lose 2

name: Pursuer Protocol
flavorProject: The academicians studied the Pursuer's reflex pattern and are certain they can duplicate it in the Triskelion Junction
flavorTech: Analysis of the Hermesian Pursuer's reflexes and the 'shadow' it casts on the Triskelion Junction enables us to momentarily boost a Titan's reaction time

name: Trireme Ballista Fire
flavorProject: Mere arrows and javelins are not enough to pierce the thick armor of the Spartan Primordials. We need concentrated ballista fire
flavorTech: A well timed bolt can turn the tide of battle

abilityText.value: Choose a Titan performing a Power Roll

name: Triskelion Power Boost
flavorProject: There is some latent power in the Balaneion itself, power we can temporarily transfer through the junction
flavorTech: Is this Us exerting our strength, or something else entirely?

name: Forced Kratos Cooldown
flavorProject: We can flood the Junction with soothing thoughts, temporarily subduing even the most violent tendencies
flavorTech: Can you hear me now?

abilityText.value: Choose a Titan that is about to gain involuntary

name: Reflex Priming
flavorProject: By slightly increasing the autonomous range of the Antikratos Protocols, we allow the Titan to take care of the lesser, more instinctive tasks, making the Junction more efficient
flavorTech: Extended use of Reflex Priming leads some Titans to develop motor tics

name: 13th Muse Grand Cannon
flavorProject: We once found a cannon with no name and hoped we never had to use it. Today we hope it still works

abilityText.value: You may choose an effect from the Payload card and roll a d10
On a 6+, the Cannon is primed
It remains primed until you fire, decide to prime a different effect, or the Battle ends
When the Cannon is primed, discard 1
and lose the indicated resource to fire
or after drawing a BP card you may discard 1
Immediately choose an effect from the Payload card and roll for priming as normal

name: Transport Trireme
flavorProject: We know enough of the Great River Works canal network to use it to our advantage

abilityText.value: A Titan on, adjacent to, or moving through a space with the Trireme token may flip the Trireme token to the spent side to equip any 1 Support or Weapon
A spent Transport Trireme can still be moved as normal but loses the Rearm ability

name: Ambrosia Containment
flavorProject: Even the Titans aren't immune to the corrupting effects of ambrosia. We need to support them however we can
flavorTech: Specialized cleanup crews risk life and limb to minimize ambrosia exposure

abilityText.value: Choose a Titan that is about to gain Ambrosia tokens, lower this gain to 1

name: Hephaestean Oxybeles
flavorProject: Though everyone talks about the 13th Muse, this oxybeles design can revolutionize the way we prepare for battle

abilityText.value: Choose a Weapon from the Armory
Then choose a Battle Board space you want to deploy the Weapon to and roll a d10:
1-5: It lands 3 spaces away from the chosen space in a random direction
6-10: It lands on the chosen space
Mark this space with a generic token
A Titan on, adjacent to, or moving through the space with the token may discard it to equip the Weapon
If the Weapon lands on a space occupied by the Primordial, it remains stuck in its body
Place a generic token on the Primordial Sheet and place 2 Break tokens and 1 Opening token in the Kratos Pool
A Titan adjacent to the Primordial or on the Primordial VP may discard the generic token to equip the Weapon

name: Hyperadrenaline Infusion
flavorProject: By stimulating the Titan's adrenal glands through the Junction, we can manufacture an incredible reflex reaction
flavorTech: Is there a limit to the Titan's power?

abilityText.value: Choose a Titan that is about to perform a voluntary movement
That Titan may move 4 more spaces during this movement

name: Pursuer Order
flavorProject: The study of the recovered cryptex has led to a breakthrough in Junction Theory
flavorTech: The wings of oppression overturned now lift you up

abilityText.value: That Titan may move up to 2 spaces

name: Rendezvous Trireme
flavorProject: You still remember that fateful rendezvous with the Symmachy. O strange bedfellows

abilityText.value: If you push the Primordial on to a space with the Trireme token, discard the token and place 1 negative
If the Primordial moves through a space with the Trireme token, discard the token, then roll a d10

name: Fate Converter
flavorProject: A Moirai verdict can be resisted, you have seen proof of that
flavorTech: Weaponized free will

name: Reverse Timeflow
flavorProject: Reverse-engineered reversed time
flavorTech: Fast-tracked to victory

name: Possibility Matrix
flavorProject: The Oracle prunes possible outcomes, we need to multiply them
flavorTech: From the infinite pool of outcomes, survival requires just one

abilityText.value: Place the top card of any Trauma deck on the bottom of that deck
You may use this ability as a free action or as a

name: Telehealing
flavorProject: We know how to stimulate healing through the Junction, though we don't know how it works
flavorTech: I see you, my children

abilityText.value: Discard up 2 to Bleeding tokens from a chosen Titan

name: Transient Death
flavorProject: By bending the Delphian Loop, we can bring back a recently deceased Titan to life. For a price...
flavorTech: Even death may die

abilityText.value: That Titan comes back to life at their Time Anchor
You may use this ability as a free action or as a

name: Quantum Armory
flavorProject: Slightly shifting the timeline allows us to re-arm the Titans in the past
flavorTech: For each task, the perfect tool

abilityText.value: Immediately equip 1 Weapon from the Argo Armory
You may swap it with one of your currently equipped Weapons (return it to the Argo Armory)
You may use this ability as a free action or when you are about to perform a

name: Opportunity Freeze
flavorProject: Slowing down time to extend your window of opportunity
flavorTech: Everyone deserves a second chance

abilityText.value: When a Titan fully misses an Attack, do not clear the Kratos Pool

name: Chronosphere Warning System
flavorProject: Monitoring the flow of time grants Titans near precognitive reflexes
flavorTech: Forecast: Survival

abilityText.value: That Titan may move up to 3 spaces

name: Time Skip
flavorProject: The study of the recovered cryptex has led to a breakthrough in Junction Theory
flavorTech: --Dovahzul text--

abilityText.value: During a Titan turn, even after you have used both of your actions, choose a Titan
That Titan may imediately perform an additional

name: Time Dilation
flavorProject: Slowing time inside the Junction
flavorTech: --Dovahzul text--

abilityText.value: During a Titan turn, even after you have used both of your actions, choose a Titan
That Titan may imediately perform an additional

name: Irem Protocols
flavorProject: Our scholars have broken the wish-codes used to hide the towers in the sand
flavorTech: Action exigent: Emergy retraction

abilityText.value: Move an empty Irem Tower Terrain tile any number of spaces in a straight line
It cannot move through other Terrain tiles or the Primordial

name: Wish Deflector
flavorProject: When properly calibrated, Delphian paracausal shielding can provide a brief respit from the barrage of wishes
flavorTech: Wishing you did not have to wish

abilityText.value: When a Titan becomes the Target of a Wish Attack, choose that Titan

name: Gold Transmogrifier
flavorProject: This alchemical process is highly unstable but remains the fastest known converter
flavorTech: Like a million tiny wishes

abilityText.value: Turn as many of that Titan's Midas tokens into Ambrosia tokens

name: Archimedean Ballista
flavorProject: Next generation of weapons utilizing the devasting power of the Sun
flavorTech: Not a ballista at all

abilityText.value: Place 3 Opening tokens or 2 Fire tokens in the Kratos Pool

name: Cloud Support Fleet
flavorProject: Our enemies dominate the skies. We need to wrest air superiority away from them
flavorTech: We have adapted the local "cirrotrireme" technology, though our cloud vessels remain inferior to the fleet of the Empire

abilityText.value: Place the Cirrotrireme token or move the Cirrotrireme token to any space on the Battle Board (even if occupied)
A Titan on, adjacent to, or moving through a space with the Cirrotrireme token may flip the token to the spent side to equip any 1 Weapon
A spent Cirrotrieme can still be moved as normal but loses the

name: Dahaka Phasing
flavorProject: Dahaka's signature in the Triskelion is like a tempestuous wind or tide. If we could surf it...
flavorTech: Anemoi reflex

name: Cloud Scout Fleet
flavorProject: We need to develop a lighter, faster method for reconnaissance and extraction
flavorTech: Second generation cloudships, hemiolias of the skies

abilityText.value: Choose a Titan that is being Wished Away
Reduce that suffered Wish Away by up to -4
You may place that Titan on any Irem Tower within range (not necessarily in front of the Primordial)

name: Ascension Protocols
flavorProject: The Babelian Lunacy is an ever-changing architectural impossibility. Maybe we should treat it like a current, not a structure?
flavorTech: Insider shortcuts

abilityText.value: Choose a Titan performing an Ascent check

name: Curse Resistor
flavorProject: We need to undersatnd the underlying imbalance of the curses
flavorTech: By dividing the curse between several willing participants simultaneously, we weaken its effects

abilityText.value: Flip one of that Titan's Condition cards
Discard one of that Titan's Condition cards

name: Ropeseller Theorem
flavorProject: Greed stronger than survival
flavorTech: In the end, it defeats itself

abilityText.value: When the Primordial reveals an AI card or triggers a Signature that targets a specific Titan, change the Targeting to

name: Calculate Statistical Certainty
flavorProject: A wise and ancient advisor of unknown origin, brought into existence by the wonders of Mnestis. It always tells the truth, no matter how bleak it is
flavorTech: Chance of survival: bleak

abilityText.value: That Titan uses the Truth Machine

name: Kintsukuroi Pharos
flavorProject: This giant searchlight is an unexpected by-product of the Last Wish. This is the 13th Muse, reconstructed
flavorTech: There is value in mending broken things

abilityText.value: Choose one Kintsukuroi Pharos Payload and place it on this card
Until the end of Battle, the Payload becomes the effect of this Argo Ability

name: Oxygen Tubes
flavorProject: Made from Primordial intestines, they carry life-saving air from the Argo
flavorTech: Time bought

name: Drag It Back!
flavorProject: Giant harpoon guns mounted on the Argo itself
flavorTech: Fire forward harpoons!

abilityText.value: The Titan closest to the Primordial immediately performs Pushback X or Pull X, where X is up to 3

name: Underwater Support Fleet
flavorProject: A reclaimed Atlantean deepsea ship serves as the eyes and ears of the Titans
flavorTech: A Galeos-class subreme, like the ones you use as harpoon tips...

abilityText.value: Place the Subreme token on any space adjacent to the Board Edge and move it up to 5 spaces, or if the Subreme is already on the Board, move it up to 5 spaces (even if occupied)
A spent Subreme can still be moved as normal but loses the
A Titan on, adjacent to, or moving through the space with the Subreme token may flip the token to the spent side to equip any 1 Weapon card from the Armory or flip an Aether token
Flip the Subreme token to the spent side to perform a Scan

name: Flash Backstep
flavorProject: You're still far from reaching the limits of cryptext tekne, though further gains will be paid by the pain of the subject
flavorTech: Is pain elation? Or are you projecting?

abilityText.value: Choose a Titan when an adjacent Primordial performs
Gain 1 Pain token to immediately move up to 9 spaces to remain adjacent

name: Painkiller Shot
flavorProject: A remote Junction command that immediately shuts off the nerves of a Titan
flavorTech: A new philosophical protocol allows us to "trick" a Titan's nervous system

abilityText.value: Either lower Pain and/or Bleed gain to 1, or ignore all Pain tokens this Round

name: Triskelion Override
flavorProject: A jolt sent through the Junction will override any natural instinct
flavorTech: Is pushing them this far worth it?

abilityText.value: Gain 3 Pain tokens to perform a

name: Inner Light
flavorProject: A solution of liquid orichalcum introduced into the bloodstream, to be triggered remotely
flavorTech: Let there be light

abilityText.value: Choose a Titan that is about to die from
That Titan draws a Grave Trauma instead

name: Anchor Drop Pod
flavorProject: Special pods of reinforced materials designed for rapid submersion
flavorTech: Prepare for Titan drop!

abilityText.value: If, during the first Primordial or Titan Round, a Titan dies, replace them with a new Titan from the Stoa
Choose a Battle Board space you want to Deploy (see Cycle V, p
11) the new Titan to and roll a d10:
1-5: It lands 3 spaces away from the chosen space in a random direction
6-10: It lands on the chosen space
If it lands on the Primordial, place 2 Closing and 1 Hope tokens in the Kratos Pool and Deploy the Titan on any adjacent space

name: Soulbalm
flavorProject: As we learn to create more nuanced Junction commands, we can speak to the Titan more directly
flavorTech: Can you hear me? You are not alone in this

abilityText.value: That Titan discards all Despair tokens or a
